content: I'm excited to try out these recipes and storage tips! I think I'll make a big batch of pesto and freeze it for future use. I've been using my fresh herbs in so many dishes lately, and it's amazing how much flavor they add. Speaking of flavor, I've been experimenting with different varieties of tomatoes from my garden. I planted a Brandywine and a Cherry Roma, and both are doing really well. The Brandywine is taking a bit longer to ripen, but the flavor is so much better than the store-bought ones. Do you have any recipe suggestions that feature fresh tomatoes as the main ingredient?
